name: Millet Mocktail (Original Flavor)
description: A unique, non-alcoholic, energy-packed beverage made from locally grown millets, combined with spices and other value-added ingredients. This drink is designed to enhance your health while supporting sustainable agriculture.

name: Millet Mocktail (Premium – Mint Flavored)
description: Premium version of our signature millet mocktail with refreshing mint flavor. A healthy, energizing beverage perfect for modern lifestyle needs.

name: Finger Millet (Ragi) Powder
description: Premium finger millet powder rich in calcium, iron, and fiber. Perfect for making nutritious porridge, dosas, and other traditional dishes.

name: Foxtail Millet Powder
description: Organic foxtail millet powder, a gluten-free alternative rich in protein and minerals. Ideal for diabetic-friendly diets and weight management.

name: Fresh Sugarcane Juice
description: Pure, unadulterated sugarcane juice extracted from fresh sugarcane. Rich in natural sugars and minerals, perfect for instant energy.
startup: Sri Om Sai Sugar Allied Production Pvt. Ltd. (SOSSA)

name: Liquid Jaggery
description: Natural liquid jaggery made from pure sugarcane juice. A healthier alternative to refined sugar, rich in minerals and antioxidants.
startup: Sri Om Sai Sugar Allied Production Pvt. Ltd. (SOSSA)

name: Agri-Health Supplement (Multivitamin)
description: Comprehensive multivitamin supplement specially formulated for farmers and agricultural workers. Supports energy, immunity, and overall health.

name: Organic Protein Powder
description: Plant-based protein powder derived from agricultural sources. High in essential amino acids, perfect for muscle building and recovery.

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil Capsules
description: Premium fish oil capsules rich in Omega-3 fatty acids. Supports heart health, brain function, and reduces inflammation.

name: Vitamin D3 Supplement
description: High-potency Vitamin D3 supplement for bone health and immune system support. Essential for overall well-being.

name: Calcium + Magnesium Tablets
description: Combined calcium and magnesium supplement for strong bones and muscle function. Essential for active agricultural workers.
